entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, McBride

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 12. POP 60%
